name: 5 experimental scenes, collage, anthology; bauhaus university, winter semester 2022/23
name_original: 5 experimental scenes, collage, anthology; bauhaus university, winter semester 2022/23
description:
a little collage, assembled out of tutorial scenes for unity that I created during this (my first) winter semester 2022/23 at bauhaus university weimar in jörg brinkmann's immersive essays course and fleshed out during the past days/weeks.

> you can read an inofficial postmortem here.
